Story_Main.para_1: This agreement is made on between
Story_Main.parties:
( ), a company incorporated in with its registered office at
a citizen of resident at (or receiving official notices at)
( ), a company incorporated in with its registered office at
Story_Main.recitals: The Company is a private company incorporated in Singapore limited by shares.
The Investor and the Company desire and wish to enter into this Agreement to regulate the affairs of the Company and the relationship between the Parties.
Story_Main.para_1: It is hereby agreed as follows:
Story_Main.numbered_2_para: In this Agreement, except to the extent that the context otherwise requires, the following terms shall have the meanings set forth below:
Story_Main.definition: Qualified Financing The issuing of equity securities (“Equity Securities”) in a transaction or series of related transactions resulting in aggregate gross proceeds to the Company of at least including conversion of the Notes and any other indebtedness.
Story_Main.numbered_2_para: The Investor agrees to invest a total consideration worth (the “Investment Amount”) in the Company by way of the convertible promissory notes (the “Notes”) issued by the Company to the Investor.
The Notes and unpaid accrued interest on the Notes will be due and payable from the date of the signing of this Agreement (the “Maturity Date”).
Interest on the Notes will accrue on an annual basis at the rate of % per annum based on a 365 days year. The Notes shall bear no interest.
The “Conversion Price” is the lesser of
Story_Main.numbered_3_para: % of the per share price paid by the purchasers of such Equity Securities in the Qualified Financing (the “Discounted Conversion Price”), or

the price per share equal to divided by the aggregate number of outstanding shares of the Company’s common stock as of immediately after the initial closing of the Qualified Financing (assuming full conversion or exercise of all convertible and exercisable securities then outstanding other than the Notes) (the “Valuation Cap”).
Story_Main.numbered_2_para: Automatic Conversion in a Qualified Financing. If the Company issues Equity Securities in a Qualified Financing, then the Notes, and any accrued but unpaid interest thereon, will automatically convert into the equity securities issued pursuant to the Qualified Financing at the Conversion Price.

Automatic Conversion at the Maturity Date. If the Notes have not been previously converted pursuant to a Qualified Financing, then, effective upon the Maturity Date, the Notes, and any accrued but unpaid interest thereon, will automatically convert into Equity Securities at % of the Valuation Cap.
If the Maturity Date or a Qualified Financing has not occurred, the Investor may elect to convert the entire Investment Amount into Equity Securities at the Valuation Cap.
If a Qualified Financing has not occurred and the Company elects to consummate a sale of the Company prior to the Maturity Date, then upon the election of the Investor, either
Story_Main.numbered_3_para: the Investor shall receive a payment equal to times the Notes, or
the entire Investment Amount shall convert into Equity Securities at the Valuation Cap.
Story_Main.numbered_2_para: The principal and accrued interest may not be prepaid unless approved in writing by Investors holding Notes whose aggregate principal amount represents a majority of the outstanding principal amount of all then-outstanding Notes (the “Requisite Holders”).

After converting to Equity Securities upon the conditions laid out in clauses 6 and 7, Investor will have the rights to participate in subsequent financing rounds of the Company in order to maintain their percentage shareholding in the Company, calculated on fully-diluted basis.
The terms of this Agreement and the Notes may be amended, or any term thereof waived, upon the written consent of the Company and the Requisite Holders.
The Notes will be a general unsecured obligation of the Company.

The Investor will have customary information and inspection rights, including receiving an annual budget, annual unaudited financial statements, quarterly unaudited financial statements, and any other information reports prepared for shareholders while the Notes remains outstanding. The Investor shall have no information rights over the financials of the company beyond those required by law.
The Parties will bear their own fees and expenses incurred in the transaction.
This Agreement shall be governed by and construed according to the laws of Singapore.
Story_Main.para_1: In witness whereof we have hereunto set our hands.
